people_also_ask.question: What are mesh shoes?
people_also_ask.heading: There are three kinds of fabric used for shoes material. First, the mesh fabric which is made of nylon or polyester yarn is very breathable. Besides the normal color, some of them can also be metallic silver color. ... It looks like carbon, but it is made of nylon or polyester yarn. So, it is called similar carbon fabric.
people_also_ask.title: Shoes Material - Mesh Fabric - Jiunn Jang Textile Co., Ltd.

people_also_ask.question: Are mesh running shoes good?
people_also_ask.heading: Since running is a more intense sport, runners tend to exert more energy. Your feet get hot, and most running shoes are made of mesh to allow air to move freely. This mesh also keeps the shoe lighter.
people_also_ask.title: The Difference between Running Shoes and Walking Shoes

people_also_ask.question: Are mesh shoes hard to clean?
people_also_ask.heading: Mesh shoes are notorious for being able to absorb pretty much anything they come into contact with, which makes them tough to clean. Luckily, with a bit of care, you can keep them free from dirt and even give them a nice, thorough clean in the washing machine if you follow the right steps!
people_also_ask.title: How to Clean Mesh Shoes: 12 Steps (with Pictures) - wikiHow
